1///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2//
3/// \file hardware_physmem.c
4/// \brief Get the total amount of physical memory (RAM)
5//
6// Author: Jonathan Nieder
7//
8// This file has been put into the public domain.
9// You can do whatever you want with this file.
10//
11///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
12
13#include "common.h"
14
15#include "tuklib_physmem.h"
16
17
18extern LZMA_API(uint64_t)
19lzma_physmem(void)
20{
21 // It is simpler to make lzma_physmem() a wrapper for
22 // tuklib_physmem() than to hack appropriate symbol visiblity
23 // support for the tuklib modules.
24 return tuklib_physmem();
25}
26
